template.name: FResponder
template.parameter: const int id, int x, int y, int tFR

template.name: Drone
template.parameter: pos actualPos, const int Nv, const double Pfail

template.name: Civilians
template.parameter: const int id, int x, int y, const int tZR, const int Tv, const double Plisten

template.name: Semaphore

query.comment: It is possible for a percentage 11/14 of all civilians to reach a safe state within 7 time units
A percentage 1/14 of all civilians is always guaranteed to reach a safe state within 1 time unit
It is possible to reach a percentage 50% of civilians rescued by others over the total amount of saved civilians
It is possible to reach a number of 2 rescues by the first responders
